title: 'Rate Limit Exceeded': Elon Musk Riles Twitter Users With Latest Clampdown
description: Amid a Dogecoin lawsuit and turmoil on Reddit, renewed chaos is sparking another stampede to alternative services.

title: Crypto OG Erik Voorhees believes DeFi has already solved the regulatory clarity problem for altcoins
description:
Shapeshift founder and long-time Bitcoin advocate Erik Voorhees believes that decentralized finance (DeFi) has already solved the issue of regulatory clarity barring people from possessing or trading a majority of cryptocurrencies. The crypto industry is concerned that all cryptocurrencies besides the four listed on the newly launched EDX Markets â€” BTC, ETH LTC, and BCH […]

The post Crypto OG Erik Voorhees believes DeFi has already solved the regulatory clarity problem for altcoins appeared first on CryptoSlate.
